item.title: On the creative process
item.description: Around the time when I was finishing my PhD thesis, I got into watching metal documentaries. I know, there's a fine line between inspiration searching and procrastination. At that time, I developed an idea (which I still hold on to) that the creative process and group dynamic involved in recording a metal album closely parallel scientific work – or any team work, more than likely. Collaborative writing, respectful disagreement about ideas, working to deadlines, shared ambition to deliver the best thing possible… it's all there.
